name: Communiganda
description:
"Communication is unlikely" -Niklas Luhmann

There's a dangerous hole in the ground, but you're the only one who seems to be aware of it! Can you warn the people of its danger before they fall in?

Controls: WASD to move; 1, 2, 3, 4 to try to initiate a dialog with an NPC.

"Anyone who says that they're great at communicating but 'people are bad at listening' is confused about how communication works." -Randall Munroe
